Title: Establishes a limitation on financial services assessments and appropriation suballocations
Summary: Establishes a limitation on financial services assessments and appropriation suballocations; requires that money obtained from assessments shall only be used to defray operating expenses of the department of financial services.
LawCode: Add ยง208, Fin Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the financial services law, in relation to a limitation on financial services assessments and appropriation suballocations
